column4: if you can ping each box from one another ok I would check if there is no firewall stopping things - at least that will eliminate networking
thanks for the tip, i can ping each box
any firewalls enabled on the boxes?
IDK, whats the best way to check?
3 chains - if they are all are accept it pretty much rules firewalls out also
its odd that putty works but I cannot ssh in via terminal or use rsync
im not familiar with unison, but assuming from your comments the sync is done over ssh ?
yes, I am trying anyway.  I dont care how they sync, I just want them to sync over the network
humm I tried some of that but no dice.  I think the underlying problem is not being able to ssh in via terminal... isnt that odd?
are you trying to ssh using root as username?
thanks for your help, I will look throught that link.  I gotta go now.  I appreciate your help
